attributes.imagesize: '''House Mollen''' is a vassal house of the North. They serve House Stark of Winterfell.==Known members==*Hallis Mollen, captain of guards at Winterfell after Jory Cassel's departure. Whereabouts unknown.==In the books==In the ''A Song of Ice and Fire'' novels, House Mollen is a lesser house in service of the Starks of Winterfell. Their sigil is a pine tree covered with snow in a pale green pile, on white.==See also==* AWOIAF (spoilers from the books)North HousesDEFAULTSORT:Mollen, HouseCategory:Noble housesCategory:Vassal housesCategory:Houses from the NorthCategory:House Mollen

'''House Mollen''' is a vassal house of [[the North]]. They serve [[House Stark]] of [[Winterfell]].
sections.Known members: *[[Hallis Mollen]], captain of guards at [[Winterfell]] after Jory Cassel's departure. Whereabouts unknown.
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, House Mollen is a lesser house in service of the Starks of Winterfell. Their sigil is a pine tree covered with snow in a pale green pile, on white.
